name: Marincess Snow
text: If a "Marincess" Link Monster(s) you control is destroyed by battle or card effect: Target 1 of those monsters; Special Summon 1 "Marincess" Link Monster from your Extra Deck with a lower Link Rating than that monster. (This is treated as a Link Summon.) It is unaffected by your opponent's card effects while you control it. You can only activate 1 "Marincess Snow" per turn.
